column1: Yesterday I decided to do the pattern of #heart_angora_hat . Why not? Besides
column2: Katia Angora yarns is so gorgeous! Ok

column1: 1) I took three hanks Katia Angora 100% yarn ( 10g / 50m)
2) I used the circular needles number 2
3) I casted on 88 stitches for 54-56cm head circumference.
5) Then decrease 4 stitches every other rows

column2: draw the yarn thought the remains stitches.

column1: 7) I learned how knitting the heart from YouTube video called ""KNITTING TUTORIAL - PUFF HEART""
